title: Is Samsung launching Galaxy S20 Ultra phones that feature 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the US you will only get the Samsung S20 trio ( S20, S20+, and S20 Ultra) with 5G modems in them. The rest of the world will also get the Samsung S20 but can choose models with or without the 5G modem in them on the S20 and S20+ (cheaper price for the 4G models). The Samsung S20 Ultra coming to the US is 1399 and 1599. Samsung Galaxy S20, S20+, S20 Ultra, Z Flip pricing and availability details

Yes, in the US and Canada all the phones in the S20 series have 5G. The S20 has sub-6 (lowband and midband) 5G only. The S20+ and S20 Ultra have sub-6 and mmWave. In some other countries, Samsung sells the S20 series phones as seperate 4G models and 5G models.
